question: How to develop my first APP?

answer.part1: Through our first meeting via Meet, we define aspects to carry out the project and then we implement a plan in 6 steps:
answer.part3: .1 We define the purpose of the application
answer.part5: .3 We choose the platform: Android, iOS or web
answer.part7: .5 We test the application, in test mode.
answer.part8: .6 We launch the application, positioning it in the market.
